articles.title: Kim Jong Il Pays Congratulatory Visit to KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Pays Congratulatory Visit to KPA
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the command of KPA Unit 586 and congratulated servicepersons there on the occasion of the 78th birthday of the KPA.
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering servicepersons and heartily congratulated them on the army day.
					
					 After receiving a salute, he saw records of victories showing a glorious course of the unit shining with exploits.
					
					 The unit has a long history as it has performed laudable feats in the defence of the country and socialist construction by displaying unrivaled patriotic devotion and popular heroism in the struggle for the party and the leader, the country and the people from the period of the hard-fought war up to this date, he noted, highly appreciating the exploits of the unit.
					
					 Learning about the feats of many heroes produced by the unit one by one, he said that these fighters were, indeed, staunch revolutionaries and true roots of the WPK as they unhesitatingly dedicated their youth and lives to the country and the people. He stressed the need for all the servicepersons to earnestly learn from the noble revolutionary spirit of the forerunners and become heroes of the new century to be remembered by the country and the people.
					
					 After looking round combat and technical equipment, he dropped in at the operation command room and military study rooms of the unit to learn about its training. He put forward important tasks which would serve as guidelines for increasing the combat capability of the unit in every way.
					
					 Then he made the rounds of the servicepersons' hall and other entertainment and educational facilities to acquaint himself in detail with the political work conducted among them.
					
					 He was pleased to learn that the unit has conducted the political work in a unique and profound manner after successfully building facilities for ideological and cultural education suited to the characteristic features of the servicepersons and all of them fully enjoy a cultural and emotional life. He called for always paying primary attention to the ideological work.
					
					 He had a photo session with the servicepersons of the unit.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Concert on Army Day
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Concert on Army Day
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a concert given by the State Merited Chorus on the army day on the occasion of the 78th founding anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 The concert began with the playing of the national anthem. Put on the stage were male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army", male solo and chorus "A Sentinel Offers Warm Greetings to the Leader", male chorus "Wind Blows on Mt. Paektu", male solo and chorus "Song of Comradeship", female solo and male chorus "Nobody Knows," and male solo and chorus "A Cameraman Has Come to Our Company" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the shining course of victory and glory covered by the heroic Korean People's Army holding aloft the red flag of the revolution and powerfully demonstrated the firm faith and indomitable will of the army and people to accomplish the Juche revolutionary cause that started in the forest of Mt. Paektu and the cause of building a great prosperous powerful nation. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the splendid performance replete with the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu given by the State Merited Chorus and highly appreciated the successful performance, extending thanks to all the creators and artistes.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the artistes of the State Merited Chorus would conduct dynamic revolutionary performing activities, deeply aware of their honorable mission and duty as buglers in the era of Songun, and thus more energetically arouse the servicepersons and people to the general advance for the Songun revolution.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Ju Sang Song, member of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of People's Security, and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs, Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, leading officials of party and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA, officials of the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media.

articles.title: People's Delegations Visit KPA
articles.content:
People's Delegations Visit KPA
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- People's delegations visited units of the Korean People's Army on the occasion of its 78th birthday.
					The delegations conveyed the gifts of General Secretary Kim Jong Il to the units.
					
					 The members of the delegations informed servicepersons of the home-front news and handed over the supplies prepared with sincerity to them.
					
					 Being briefed on the units' careers of victory and glory, they felt the high honor and pride of having the invincible revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 They joined the servicepersons in holding colorful events to celebrate the army day.
					
					 They were deeply moved by the invincible might of the revolutionary armed forces, which have grown to be the main force of the Songun revolution, while seeing the servicepersons in their optimistic life.
					
					 They met and had talks with servicepersons who are performing feats in their service and played sport games with them to significantly celebrate the army day. 
					
					 They went round several places of the units and conversed with servicepersons, calling upon them to reliably defend the country.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons, people from all walks of life and school youth and children laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 The statue of the President on Mansu Hill in the city of Pyongyang was visited by servicepersons, working people and school youth and children and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Seen before the statue was a floral basket from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Placed before it were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units, scientific, educational, cultural and art and public health and media institutions, industrial establishments and schools and flowers.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statue in humble reverence.
					
					 Floral baskets were also laid before his statues in different parts of the city.
					
					 Servicepersons, people and school youth and children across the country placed floral baskets and flowers before the statues of the President in their residential areas.

articles.title: Wreaths and Floral Baskets Laid
articles.content:
Wreaths and Floral Baskets Laid
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and floral baskets before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Sunday, the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Seen on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the ceremonies were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Placed at the stands of the cemeteries were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK while a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK was laid before the main sculpture of the tower "Victory".
					
					 Also laid there were wreaths and floral baskets in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units and scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and media and press organs and institutions and industrial establishments at all levels, farms and schools in the city.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs and paid respects to the men and officers of the KPA who won the shining victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 They placed bouquets and flowers before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 Wreaths and flowers were also laid before the statues of martyrs, the monuments to fallen KPA soldiers and the martyrs cemeteries in other parts of the country.
					
					 The military attaches corps here placed a wreath and a floral basket before the cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the war memorial tower and bouquets before the bust of Kim Jong Suk at the cemetery.

articles.title: Army Day Celebrated
articles.content:
Army Day Celebrated
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the country on Sunday, the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 In Pyongyang they presented beautiful sea of dancers to the tune of song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" at dancing venues, including the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower and the April 25 House of Culture, in profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung who founded the genuine revolutionary army for the people and defeated two imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 The youngsters were full of deep reverence for General Secretary Kim Jong Il as they enthusiastically danced to the tune of songs "Let's Sing of General Dear to People" and "Our General Is Best".
					
					 The dancing parties demonstrated the firm faith and will of youth and students to display their wisdom and vigor in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Similar parties were also held in other parts of the country.
					
					 Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, too, presented a dancing party at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Sunday on the same occasion.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Tanzanian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Tanzanian President
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Jakaya Mrisho Kikwete, President of Tanzania, on April 23 on the occasion of the 46th birthday of the United Republic of Tanzania.
					Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Tanzania would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, Kim in the message wished the President success in his work for national unity and economic progress.

articles.title: Floral Basket form Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket form Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by a delegation of the Liaoning Association for International Friendly Contact of China on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 It was handed to an official concerned on Sunday by Standing Vice-President of the association Hu Feng Wei who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Swedish Delegation Here
articles.content:
Swedish Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Stockholm Institute for Security and Development Policy of Sweden led by Director Niklas Swanstrom arrived here Sunday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Birthday of KPA
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Birthday of KPA 
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates an editorial to the 78th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 The birth of the Juche-oriented revolutionary armed forces on April 25, Juche 21 (1932) provided a powerful military guarantee for victoriously advancing the Korean revolution and the start of shining history of Songun Korea always emerging victorious by dint of the matchless military strength, the editorial notes, and says:
					
					 The KPA has glorified its ever-victorious history and traditions generation after generation as it has held Kim Jong Il, the great illustrious commander of Songun, at the top post of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 The KPA is a strong revolutionary army which always wins victory by dint of his military strategy and idea, tactics, matchless attack spirit and pluck. It is also invincible revolutionary armed forces which emerge victorious on the strength of his idea on the army-people unity.
					
					 The strategy and tactics of the KPA that has grown under his leadership represent superb war tactics whereby to repel any "preemptive attack" of the enemy at a single stroke and hold the definite initiative as well as creative and ever-changing tactics which no one can imagine or stand.
					
					 The attack spirit of the KPA is the strong spirit that does not allow any concession and retreat in any adversity and a steady fighting spirit that does not allow moment's halt until the final victory is won.
					
					 If the imperialist enemies intrude into the sky, land and waters of the DPRK even 0.001mm, its army will beat them back at a stroke by mercilessly showering bombs and shells on them. It is the firm determination of the KPA.
					
					 The army and the people have become oneness in idea and fighting spirit on the basis of the revolutionary soldier spirit and the traits of the army assisting the people and vice versa are highly displayed. As a result, the roots of society of the DPRK are further consolidated and the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity as the country of steel-like single-minded unity.
					
					 The cause of building a thriving nation is sure to be accomplished as there is the KPA which has grown to be the invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu in the grim tempest of the revolution under the leadership of the great commander of Songun.

articles.title: Japan's Reckless Moves to Grab Tok Islets Assailed
articles.content:
Japan's Reckless Moves to Grab Tok Islets Assailed
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government in its recent "diplomatic blue book" claimed "dominium" over Tok Islets. Earlier, the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan decided to carry contents asserting "dominium" over Tok Islets in textbooks of all social subjects to be used at elementary schools from 2011.
					 The reality proves that Japan set the reinvasion of Korea as the basic orientation of its foreign policy for aggression and puts main emphasis on training younger people to be a shock brigade for militarist reinvasion in the history education among them, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article.
					
					 Japan's claim to Tok Islets is far-fetched assertion and sheer sophism as it has neither historical validity nor legal ground, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Japanese government is making far-fetched assertion that Tok Islets belong to Japan, in utter disregard of the undeniable historical facts and objective reality.
					
					 The "dominium" over Tok Islets, Japan's sheer fabrication, is, in essence, a new theory of reinvasion of Korea, the modern version of "theory of conquest of Korea".
					
					 Japan is working hard to invent justification and pretext for staging a comeback to Korea while persistently insisting on "dominium" over Tok Islets. Herein lies one of important reasons why it continues drawing the attention of the international community to the issue of Tok Islets while doggedly insisting on "dominium" over them.
					
					 Such moves of Japan are rendering the confrontation between the DPRK and Japan extremely acute, the article says, warning that any action to be taken by the Japanese reactionaries to seize Tok Islets will only precipitate their own self-destruction.

articles.title: Authorities' Obstruction to Reunification Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Obstruction to Reunification Flailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Labor Headquarters of the committee called a press conference outside the "Ministry of Unification" building on April 22 in protest against the puppet authorities' hindrance to the reunification movement of workers.
					 At the press conference speakers charged that the ministry is persistently obstructing the workers' reunification movement for implementing the June 15 joint declaration under the unreasonable pretexts.
					
					 The present authorities' undisguised control and hindrance to non-governmental exchange and cooperation resulted in such vicious cycle as retrogression of inter-Korean relations, they pointed out, contending that the blame for the present crisis is on the authorities of the "government" and the ministry.
					
					 They demanded that the authorities retract their wrong stand on non-governmental cooperation and exchange and opt for the improvement and progress of the south-north relations.

articles.title: Just Struggle of S. Korean People Supported
articles.content:
Just Struggle of S. Korean People Supported
						
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on April 17 to mark the 50th anniversary of the April 19 Uprising by the south Korean people.
					 The statement said that the uprising, which was launched in south Korea in April 1960 against the corrupt rule of traitor Syngman Rhee, a fascist dictator, was an eruption of the south Korean people's resentment toward the traitor and the colonial rule of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The April 19 Popular Uprising was an anti-U.S. and anti-fascist resistance and a struggle for the independent reunification of Korea, it said, adding that the spirit of the uprising still remains alive.
					
					 The statement noted that the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops are still present in south Korea and the fascist rule is going on there.
					
					 The organizations fully support the just struggle of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification, it stressed.

articles.title: Meeting for Peace in Northeast Asia Held
articles.content:
Meeting for Peace in Northeast Asia Held in Japan
						
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting for peace in Northeast Asia was held in Tokyo, Japan on April 17 on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 50th anniversary of the April 19 Popular Uprising.
					 Attending it were members of the Late Spring Commemoration Council of the Late Rev. Mun Ik Hwan for Embracing National Reunification and other organizations in south Korea, Korean residents in Japan and Japanese personages.
					
					 At the meeting speakers deplored that the Korean Peninsula has been turned back to the past era of grave confrontation.
					
					 They referred to the efforts being made by reunification movement organizations in south Korea to significantly greet the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Addresses of solidarity were made by Japanese personages at the meeting.
					
					 They said that it is a very important task at present for the Japanese authorities to repeal the policy of national discrimination and normalize the Japan-DPRK relations.
					
					 They declared that they would wage a joint struggle for peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Italy
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Italy
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Fermo group for the study of the Juche idea, the Songun idea was formed with due ceremony in Fermo City, Italy on April 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Flavio Pettinari was elected chief of the group at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Italy
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was brought out in booklet by the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Songun Idea in Fermo of Italy on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The work, published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998), clarifies the five-point policy of the great national unity which serves as important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Austria
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Austria
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria issued a bulletin on April 18 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The bulletin carried a photograph of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 The bulletin in an article introduced the detailed facts that the President founded the Juche idea, the Songun idea, led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory to achieve the historic cause of the national liberation, repelled the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion to honorably defend the freedom and independence of the country and turned the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 It also said that Kim Jong Il was born in the Secret Camp of Mt. Paektu and grew up while hearing gunfire as lullaby during the anti-Japanese war and nurtured his qualification and personality as an ever-victorious strategist in the flames of the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il helps defend the national sovereignty from the constant aggression moves on the part of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and reliably ensure socialist construction.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Various Countries
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Lectures and seminars took place in Kyrgyzstan, Romania, India, Democratic Congo and Nigeria between April 5 and 12 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army and the 17th publication anniversary of the 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation.
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan said at the lecture that President Kim Il Sung is the great thinker-theoretician and the sun of mankind as he opened up the era of independence, a new era in human history, by founding the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association noted that the President's noble cause has been successfully carried forward to completion by NDC Chairman Kim Jong Il and that the KPA has grown to be invincible revolutionary armed forces and matchless strong army under his Songun revolutionary leadership, firmly defending socialism in the DPRK.
					
					 The representative of the Romanian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association expressed belief that the Korean people would frustrate all kinds of challenges of the imperialists and certainly emerge victorious in the struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the country's reunification.
					
					 Abdullahi Muhammad Yamma, chairman of the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies, in his keynote report titled "Kim Il Sung, the Three Charters for National Reunification" at the seminar said that Korea's reunification is the most urgent task facing the Korean people and that they fully support the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
